email_content:
Hi Maria,

I hope you’re doing well and that life in Barcelona is treating you kindly.

It’s been a while since we last caught up, so I wanted to drop you a quick note. Work has kept me on my toes lately—I’ve been involved in some challenging but rewarding projects focused on helping people get back on their feet. Outside of work I’ve been reading a couple of new novels, experimenting with new recipes, and trying to sneak in weekend hikes whenever I can.

How have you been? I’d love to hear about your studies, any recent adventures, or simply how your week is going. Maybe we can set up a video chat sometime soon?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Un abrazo,

[Your Name]
sensitive_items: His treatment plan included a combination of medication-assisted therapy and cognitive behavioral therapy.
Michael Johnson, a 30-year-old male with a history of opioid abuse, presented a unique challenge due to his co-occurring mental health issues.
